org.elasticsearch.index.query

Class SimpleQueryParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.util.QueryBuilder
      • org.apache.lucene.queryparser.simple.SimpleQueryParser
        • org.elasticsearch.index.query.SimpleQueryParser

  • public class SimpleQueryParser
extends org.apache.lucene.queryparser.simple.SimpleQueryParser
    Wrapper class for Lucene's SimpleQueryParser that allows us to redefine different types of queries.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SimpleQueryParser.Settings
      Class encapsulating the settings for the SimpleQueryString query, with their default values
